channel.title: Rune Maker --- Building a Revolution --- Looking for web client coder ---
channel.description:
[b][size=12pt]Hello there fellow moparscapians! Im x andrew x and for the last month or so I and my freind have been working on a Runescape emulations site that has a server infused into it. We are always working on it but it has become alot of work for us to do it all on our own so were looking to hire staff to help out with it. If you would like to aply for any of the positions we have availabe then please send a message eather on this topic or send me a private message or you can even contact me on my msn at [url=http://Runemaker-xandrewx@hotmail.com]Runemaker-xandrewx@hotmail.com[/url] or visit us at [url=http://www.Rune-Maker.com]www.Rune-Maker.com[/url][/size][/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/4l61x1.jpg[/img]
[b][size=12pt]Fill this out to apply for Rune Maker staff:[/size][/b] [code]What are you applying for?: How long have you been Coding games/Clients?: How old are you?: Have you ever worked with graphic design?: What makes you better then the rest?: What country do you live in (for time zones)?: Do you work well with others?: Do you have an email account/msn? If so please provide:[/code]
[size=18pt]Game coder's [/size]
Main coder and updater ---- X andrew X Quest maker ---- Available! (must have a detailed knowledge of Java and protocols) Trainee Coder ---- Clockwise12, but still looking for others to train.
[size=18pt]Webclient Coder[/size] Main and only webclient coder ---- Available and drastically needed! Needs to know how to build a webclient and no just look on with a tutorial, our clients most of the time are custom and you will need to know protocols and how to work with mysql.
[size=18pt]Pictures [/size]
Site updates
Server Checker --- Beta version includes adding, deleting, online status, time up, time since up, and server name. Updated [4-5-10] Polished up page & added gold server slots [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/vdo8bp.jpg[/img]
Custom made forums --- Beta version includes new toping, sticky toping, helper level (like rep) goes to 500, last post made, name of section, emulation area, message center, player sent messages, animated Icons, ability to upload 60 mb files to the site and share, if you get gold you can upload 2gb files and you get direct downloading.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ka6aom.jpg[/img]
Game updates
New home area --- Donator portal, cleaned out all of the annoying objects like closes bank booths, added in smaller bank area, adding in portals, added in bankers and plants.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vql6a8.jpg[/img]
Graphic updates for game --- new ints for items added, new pictures for buttons added, dagon'hai set.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/294t0tc.jpg[/img]
Graphic/Map Data Update: Godwars area Hd
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/azj30g.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

What are you applying for?: Trainee Coder
How long have you been Coding games/Clients?: Servers: 4-5 years Clients: 1-2 Years
How old are you?: 14
Have you ever worked with graphic design?: Yes, I create Logo’s, menu bars, software boxes, client backgrounds, software backgrounds, etc.
What makes you better then the rest?: I have much experience and am determined to finish what I start. I have knowledge in coding HTML, Java, and Visual Basic.
What country do you live in (for time zones)?: EST USA
Do you work well with others?: Yes
Do you have an email account/msn? If so please provide: rpggoldfarmer@gmail.com

Just a quick suggestion too, if you want to advertise use Google ads on your website. Ill post my ad for my anti-virus software if you let me (free of course)

item.title: Rune Maker --- Building a Revolution --- Looking for web client coder ---
item.dc:creator: @runemaker runemaker
item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

Guys just to let you know, im x andrew x, my account crapped out on me because of an old email account not working so it couldn’t send a verification email, and Priv Serv Man Ill talk to you and send you an email, after we get our 317 going were looking to start a 508. I could use the extra help from another coder for 508 because im still learning this myself and we could learn together, Btw update: New ads on site!!! We are now a 100% legal company with a server that can not go offline because of the area its hosted and we have copy right and my brothers a laywer so I can use him if I want,

                     Long lived Rune-maker

Read full topic

item.title: Rune Maker --- Building a Revolution --- Looking for web client coder ---
item.dc:creator: @Priv_Serv_Man Priv Serv Man
item.description:
@Priv_Serv_Man wrote:

What are you applying for?: Jr Coder- I am also interested in Advertisement/Forum management along side coding if thats possible.
How long have you been Coding games/Clients?: I have coded 317s and 508s together for about a year, maybe more. I am mostly interested in 508. I really would like some actual experienced coders to work with like you guys, instead of working with tutorials and other things I have picked up along the way. I am actually an ok coder and I could use the extra experience.
How old are you?: 14
Have you ever worked with graphic design?: No graphical design at all, strictly source coding.
What makes you better then the rest?: I want to get better and I do have experience on my hands.
What country do you live in (for time zones)?: Eastern time U.S.
Do you work well with others?: Yes.
Do you have an email account/msn? If so please provide: I am having probs with msn atm, but my email is patrickmu@suddenlink. net
I have skype and AIM so pm me for those.

Read full topic
